column1:
When did halal carts take over NYC?


Just curious if anyone has more information about this.

Has anyone in Williamsburg Negotiated their rent down due to the L closing?


As the title reads, I'm looking to see if any current resident's of Williamsburg have negotiated their rent down from what it originally was due to the L closing. I'm debating if I should move once my lease is up or if i should stay for a little while longer with cheaper rent.

Thoughts?
What are some great vegan/vegetarian places in NYC?
